Title: Small factories turn out great things
Designer: Yu Weibo (俞微波)Meng Muyi (孟幕颐)Jin Zhaofang (金肇芳)Wei Yingzhou (魏瀛洲)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: The small Shanghai Yongxin Seamless Steel Tube Factory (上海永鑫无缝钢管厂) pioneered the production of seamless steel pipes with a small diameter. The poster shows the production team at work, headed by team leader Pan Ayao (潘阿耀), second from right, wearing gloves.
